comment: ICON RAFFLE TIME ! You can win an icon like this of you , your favorite character or OC in this style ! - like , follow and retweet to enter random winners will be chosen on Dec ! Best of luck and happy holidays ! <URL>

(m / multi-sentence

                  :mod (e / earthquake)))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (w / win-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (ii / icon
                        :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                              :ARG2 (t2 / this))
                        :example (o / or
                              :op1 (y2 / you)
                              :op2 (c / character
                                    :mod (f / favorite)
                                    :poss y2)
                              :op3 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "OC"))))
                  :manner (s / style
                        :mod (t3 / this)))
            :snt3 (a / and
                  :op1 (l / like-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 (y3 / you))
                  :op2 (f2 / follow-02
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y3)
                  :op3 (r2 / retweet-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y3)
                  :purpose (e2 / enter-01

                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (w2 / win-01)
                              :mod (r3 / random)))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 12))
            :snt4 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l2 / luck
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 (g / good-02)
                              :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
                  :op2 (h2 / holiday
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / happy-02)))))
